Text.Page:
Bah! Can't get up the mountain without being attacked on all sides!

Want another mission? Take out Stalker Company {@LinkCreature:32#7#reapers}, {@LinkCreature:32#8#destroyers}, and {@LinkCreature:32#9#snipers}, and {@LinkCreature:32#12#Sihran templars}.

Report to Relinda when you're done.
Your deeds will do wonders for morale, <PCNAME>.
If you have dead mercenaries, I have the reward.
